overview: I used to come home and my drunken douchebag dad would make me cook dinner and clean up all the time! Now when I come home my new stepdaddy is totally nude and stroking his big white meat waiting for me to get naked and give him a hand! OMG! We've been having so much fun just sucking and fucking anytime we want - but only when mom's not home!
title: My New White Stepdaddy 7
